oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Graduation photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Taylor
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Photographers
African American women
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Young African American woman in mortar board and black robe, with rimless glasses.

The young graduate in this photograph is posed looking over her right shoulder and gazing up into the distance. Her rimless eyeglasses, which enhance her large eyes, suggest reading in pursuit of knowledge. The photograph, although of an unidentified subject, bears the imprint Taylor, Nashville.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Graduation photograph, African American Photography Collection, MS.2129. University of Tennessee, Knoxville -- Libraries
